response.overview: In 2022, sold-out audiences around the UK were treated to an unforgettable night in the form of 10cc's Ultimate Greatest Hits tour. On 27 October, On Air joined 10cc at The New Theatre, Oxford and captured the entire 19-song set in all its glory.  Filled with almost 2 hours’ worth of songs from across their glittering 50-year career, the concert stream includes fan favourites like 'The Things We Do For Love', 'Wall Street Shuffle', 'I'm Not In Love', and 'Art For Art's Sake'.  A cinematic live stream of the highest quality, the show is available in 4K UHD with Dolby Vision and  Dolby Atmos sound. The show can be streamed on demand with unlimited replays through the On Air website, mobile and TV apps.
response.tagline: Live from the New Oxford Theatre... all the hits you know and love, available now in cinematic quality.
response.title: 10cc 'The Ultimate Greatest Hits Tour'

results.name: 10cc 'The Ultimate Greatest Hits Tour' Live Concert Stream [Official Trailer] (On Air)
